chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following problem:

my package tracking does not show up, I did order it about a week ago.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 10694000292284

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB
